import matplotlib.pyplot as plt import plotly.plotly as py # Learn about API authentication here: /python/getting-started # Find your api_key here: /settings/api fig, ax = plt.subplots() ax.plot([2,1,3,1,2]) update = {'data':[{'fill': 'tozeroy'}]} # this updates the trace plot_url = py.plot_mpl(fig, update=update, filename='mpl-basic-area')
